patterns: Tell me the details for admission?
Admission Details
admission requirements
I want to know about admission requirement?
responses: Candidates with GPA 2.50 out of 5.00 in SSC, HSC or equivalent examinations will have to have accumulated GPA of 6.00 to qualify for admission,Only candidates with science (higher math with pass mark) in HSC or equivalent examinations qualify for admission in engineering programs,For GCE candidates, 2'A' Levels and 5 'O' Levels with minimum four 'B' grades and three 'C' grades are required for admission in bachelor's programs,Appeared candidates at the terminal level can apply for provisional admission but must fulfill the condition of provisional admission at the earliest.

patterns: Tell me about IUBAT grading system
IUBAT grading System
iubat grading system details
grading system
grade
responses: IUBAT follows a letter grading system and the grades A, B+, B, B-,C+, C, C-, D+ and D are considered passing grades. Grade 'F' is the failing grade. For details please visit the link https://iubat.edu/academics/#:~:text=IUBAT%20follows%20a%20letter%20grading,F'%20is%20the%20failing%20grade.

coordinator of bba
bba coordinator
coordinator bba
responses: Dr . Hasanuzzaman Tushar

patterns: tell me about scholarship details
Scholarship details
scholarship
responses: Scholarships  on tuition for bachelor's and diploma programs are awarded to students based on their academic performance and financial status,90-95% Merit Scholarships,20-25% Performance Scholarships, BDT 20 MillionScholarships Budget Annually,Merit Scholarships Merit Scholarships on tuition for bachelor and diploma programs are awarded to students based on their academic performance in SSC, HSC, A Levels and equivalent examination. For more details visit the link https://iubat.edu/scholarships/
